title: White Collar
overview:
White Collar is about the unlikely partnership of a con artist and an FBI agent who have been playing cat and mouse for years.

Neal Caffrey, a charming criminal mastermind, is finally caught by his nemesis, FBI Agent Peter Burke. When Neal escapes from a maximum-security prison to find his lost love, Peter nabs him once again. Rather than returning to jail, Neal suggests an alternative plan: He'll provide his criminal expertise to assist the Feds in catching other elusive criminals. Initially wary, Peter quickly finds that Neal provides insight and intuition that can't be found on the right side of the law.

episodes.title: At What Price
episodes.overview: Neal tries to clear Peter's name when he is charged with the murder of Senator Pratt.

episodes.title: Out of the Frying Pan
episodes.overview: Peter assigns Neal a new handler to investigate an online black market, but Neal’s loyalties will be tested when he discovers the trail might lead to Mozzie.

episodes.title: One Last Stakeout
episodes.overview: As Peter settles into a promoted position at the FBI, Neal has to pull off a brazen museum heist right underneath the FBI’s nose.

episodes.title: Controlling Interest
episodes.overview: Peter sends Neal undercover with a psychiatrist who may be manipulating her patients into committing robberies.

episodes.title: Master Plan
episodes.overview: Neal goes undercover as a butler to help expose an imposter hoping to cash in on a wealthy family's fortune.

episodes.title: Ice Breaker
episodes.overview: Peter and Neal must go undercover as ice skating pros to expose a counterfeit passport ring in Little Odessa.

episodes.title: Quantico Closure
episodes.overview: While Neal delves further into the mystery of the Codex, Peter takes on a classified espionage case with a fellow FBI agent: his ex-girlfriend.

episodes.title: Digging Deeper
episodes.overview: Neal and Peter take on an unprecedented asset recovery case for the Museum of Natural History: a stolen Tyrannosaurus Rex skeleton and its egg.

episodes.title: No Good Deed
episodes.overview: Peter’s thrown back into an unsolved larceny case that has Neal worried – because Neal’s the one who committed the crime.

episodes.title: Live Feed
episodes.overview: A life hangs in the balance after Hagen tasks Neal with his final assignment.

episodes.title: Shot Through the Heart
episodes.overview: When Neal and Peter go after an assassin, the stakes are raised even higher when they realize this may be the same person who has been pulling Neal’s strings.

episodes.title: Taking Stock
episodes.overview: When a corporate espionage case has personal ties to Neal, Peter recruits Diana from maternity leave for an undercover sting on a rogue stock trader.

episodes.title: Diamond Exchange
episodes.overview: Neal and Peter race against a criminal mastermind to unearth an invaluable treasure hidden in New York.

episodes.title: Wanted
episodes.overview: On an exotic remote island, Peter must race to find Neal and Mozzie before a ruthless bounty hunter captures Neal and locks him away for good.

episodes.title: Most Wanted
episodes.overview: Having found Neal and Mozzie, Peter must help devise a plan to return Neal to the U.S. and avoid being captured by a ruthless bounty hunter.

episodes.title: Diminishing Returns
episodes.overview: With Neal and his team's help, Peter surreptitiously investigates a brilliant thief who has avoided the FBI's capture for years.

episodes.title: Parting Shots
episodes.overview: While undercover, Neal romances a beautiful widow and is surprised when the con turns real and he begins to have feelings for her.

episodes.title: Honor Among Thieves
episodes.overview: An alluring female art thief makes Neal an offer, but to take her up on the deal, he must steal a valuable piece of art from under the nose of Peter and the FBI.

episodes.title: Identity Crisis
episodes.overview: Mozzie buys a storage unit that leads him, Neal, and Peter on a dangerous treasure hunt, following clues left by what Mozzie believes to be the modern day remnants of a revolutionary spy ring.

episodes.title: Compromising Positions
episodes.overview: When a criminal Peter arrested hires a high-powered political fixer to sabotage the trial, Peter and Neal must take on this brilliant but devious opponent who maintains a lawful facade.

episodes.title: Ancient History
episodes.overview: Peter and his team investigate a series of museum heists targeting rare ancient artifacts.

episodes.title: Gloves Off
episodes.overview: Neal discovers a White Collar boxing ring where traders fight for insider information. In order to take down the corrupt CEO, Peter and Neal must step out of the office and step in to the ring.

episodes.title: Vested Interest
episodes.overview: Peter and Neal attend an FBI conference where someone is trying to steal high valued defense technology. They soon discover the thief's brazen plan to take something much more valuable from the FBI.

episodes.title: Family Business
episodes.overview: Peter and Neal attempt to find the truth behind Neal's father's crime. In doing so, Neal must go undercover into the world of counterfeit whiskey to take down a high-level member of the Irish Mob.

episodes.title: Brass Tacks
episodes.overview: Peter and Neal look into Senator Pratt's ties to corrupt cops who framed Neal's father and tore his family apart. Their investigation leads them to a real-estate developer running a kickback scheme.

episodes.title: Empire City
episodes.overview: Peter and Neal work a forgery and money laundering case that leads them into two of the most iconic New York institutions, taxi cabs and jazz.

episodes.title: Shoot the Moon
episodes.overview: Peter and Neal work from different angles as they attempt to stop a thieving duo bent on going out in a hail of bullets rather than watch their whirlwind relationship fade away behind bars.

episodes.title: The Original
episodes.overview: Peter and Neal get closer to finding out the mystery behind Ellen's evidence box while simultaneously chiseling their way through the world of sculpture forgery.

episodes.title: In the Wind
episodes.overview: Peter and Neal are one heist away from retrieving the evidence box hidden inside the Empire State Building. Meanwhile, Senator Pratt has enlisted a small army of FBI agents to find the box before Neal.

episodes.title: On Guard
episodes.overview: Despite successfully escaping after having robbed the Federal Reserve, a notorious thief returns to retrieve the stash he left behind.

episodes.title: Where There's a Will
episodes.overview: When a forged will turns out to be a treasure map, Peter and Neal find themselves in a race to find the inheritance and save the kidnapped daughter of the beneficiary.

episodes.title: Deadline
episodes.overview: When a magazine journalist's life is threatened, Diana goes undercover as her assistant to protect her while Peter and Neal investigate the subject of the journalist's story.

episodes.title: The Dentist of Detroit
episodes.overview: When a mobster from Mozzie's Detroit childhood surfaces in Manhattan, Neal and Peter must help their friend rework a scam from his past to take down the ruthless gangster and prevent a mob war.

episodes.title: Veiled Threat
episodes.overview: When a black widow arrives in New York, Neal and Peter must go undercover as wealthy bachelors to find her next target.

episodes.title: Scott Free
episodes.overview: When a teenage conman goes on a wild crime spree in New York, Peter realizes he has a new Neal Caffrey on his hands.

episodes.title: Taking Account
episodes.overview: When an expert hacker drains a prominent New York bank, Neal assumes the criminal's identity in order to spend the pilfered fortune and draw him out of hiding.

episodes.title: As You Were
episodes.overview: When an old Naval Academy buddy of Agent Jones goes missing, Peter and Neal delve into the dangerous world of international private security to find him.

episodes.title: On the Fence
episodes.overview: When Neal and Peter discover wanted fugitive Matthew Keller is smuggling priceless Egyptian antiquities into the city, Neal must go undercover with an exotic and beautiful Egyptologist to locate and capture his foe.

episodes.title: Countdown
episodes.overview: Neal and Mozzie must stay one step ahead of the the FBI while appearing to work with them in order to keep them from discovering that they possess the treasure.

episodes.title: Checkmate
episodes.overview: Neal is forced to come clean with Peter about the hidden cache in order to save Elizabeth.

episodes.title: Upper West Side Story
episodes.overview: When scholarship funds from a prestigious prep school mysteriously disappear, Neal poses as a substitute teacher to help Peter and the FBI figure out where the money is really going.

episodes.title: Neighborhood Watch
episodes.overview: When Elizabeth overhears one of her neighbors in a suspicious conversation, her curiosity leads Peter and Neal to uncover a robbery plot against a posh Manhattan Hotel.

episodes.title: Pulling Strings
episodes.overview: Neal gets a taste of what his ideal life in New York might be like when he is assigned to work a case with his ex-girlfriend, Sara Ellis.

episodes.title: Stealing Home
episodes.overview: When a wealthy Yankees fan recruits Neal to help steal a prized piece of memorabilia, Neal is reminded of what life could be like again as a high-end thief.

episodes.title: Judgment Day
episodes.overview: When Agent Kramer returns to derail Neal's commutation, Neal races to right a wrong from his past.

episodes.title: Withdrawal
episodes.overview: An elusive master thief has targeted a handful of New York's most prestigious banks, and it's up to Peter and Neal to thwart his next heist.

episodes.title: Need to Know
episodes.overview: Neal goes undercover as a political "fixer" in order to bring down a corrupt politician. Meanwhile, he also begins to suspect that Peter is investigating the plane explosion behind his back.

episodes.title: Copycat Caffrey
episodes.overview: A talented criminal has copycatted a Neal Caffrey crime, and evidence points to a suspect on a college campus. Meanwhile, Alex returns with some bad news and Diana discovers the music box is hiding something.

episodes.title: By the Book
episodes.overview: Mozzie fears that the object of his affection has been kidnapped, and turns to Neal and Peter for help.

episodes.title: Unfinished Business
episodes.overview: In order to save the life of an insurance investigator named Sara Ellis, Neal and Peter have to find out why a real-estate mogul put a price on her head.

episodes.title: In the Red
episodes.overview: The arrest of a jewel thief leads Peter and Neal toward a much more heinous extortion case against adoptive parents.

episodes.title: Prisoner's Dilemma
episodes.overview: An FBI Agent is accused of selling witness locations during criminal trials, and the U.S. Marshals ask Peter and Neal for help.

episodes.title: Company Man
episodes.overview: Neal and Peter must go undercover into the world of corporate espionage after a tech company's head researcher is murdered.

episodes.title: Point Blank
episodes.overview: When Peter and Neal find a vital clue in the mystery of who killed Kate, Neal orchestrates an elaborate con to bring himself face to face with her murderer.

episodes.title: Burke's Seven
episodes.overview: When Peter is suspended by the FBI for a crime he didn't commit, he is forced to run a sting with Neal and the gang to catch Mozzie's shooter, and clear his name.

episodes.title: Forging Bonds
episodes.overview: With the mastermind behind Kate's death uncovered, Peter and Neal explore their pasts to gain answers.

episodes.title: What Happens in Burma...
episodes.overview: When the son of an American diplomat is detained in Burma for a crime he didn't commit, Peter and Neal delve into the exotic but dangerous world of jewelry smuggling to prove his innocence.

episodes.title: Countermeasures
episodes.overview: When an old friend of June's late husband shows up at Neal's doorstep, Neal suspects he's looking for more than a trip down memory lane.

episodes.title: Payback
episodes.overview: Neal is forced to make a dangerous deal with Matthew Keller's former adversary in order to save his partner and friend.

episodes.title: Power Play
episodes.overview: Peter and Neal must assume each others' identities to uncover a collusion scheme that is causing blackouts in New York.

episodes.title: Under the Radar
episodes.overview: After weeks of working the Vincent Adler case with little to show for it, the team finally gets a break when Sara uncovers what Adler has been hunting. Meanwhile, Neal gets closer to finding out the truth about Kate's death.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.overview: FBI Agent Peter Burke takes an unconventional route in tracking down a ruthless and devious outlaw named "Dutchman". In order to catch the counterfeiter, he employs the help of incarcerated con man, Neal Caffrey.

episodes.title: Threads
episodes.overview: It's Fashion Week and everyone in New York is abuzz with excitement; everyone but Peter Burke. Nevertheless, when advanced technology embedded with security data is secretly woven into the fabric of a runway dress, Peter and Neal must dive into the world of fashion to stop an international criminal from completing a treacherous sale.

episodes.title: Book of Hours
episodes.overview: The disappearance of a precious bible creates an interesting union when a New York Mafia kingpin enlists the help of Peter and the FBI in tracking down his beloved artifact. But while rooting out the thief, Neal finds himself in a tango with a sexy female villain and must decide where his loyalty truly lies.

episodes.title: Flip of the Coin
episodes.overview: Peter thinks he’s in for it when Elizabeth shows up at the office with her friend Dana in tow. But Peter isn’t the one in trouble this time; it’s Dana’s husband, Captain John Mitchell, who is in the hot seat.

episodes.title: The Portrait
episodes.overview: When an expensive portrait is stolen from a young woman, Peter and Neal set a sting for the cunning and deadly culprit. Neal must uncover the secret truth of the portrait's origin even as the net tightens around the villain ... and around Neal himself!

episodes.title: All In
episodes.overview: Thrust into the seedy underbelly of New York's Chinatown, Peter and Neal must navigate vicious Triads, mysterious Interpol agents, and a game of Pai Gow in order to capture their target.

episodes.title: Free Fall
episodes.overview: The FBI investigates a spectacular jewelry heist and all the clues point to Neal. Now Peter must figure out if his "partner" is telling the truth or if Neal is pulling a con of his own.

episodes.title: Hard Sell
episodes.overview: Neal must infiltrate a company of corrupt Wall Street brokers to preserve his deal with the FBI. When Peter is forced to go undercover alongside him, a discovery is made that could change their partnership forever.

episodes.title: Bad Judgment
episodes.overview: When Peter and Neal discover that an estate judge committing mortgage fraud is also connected to Fowler, they devise a plan to bring them both down.

episodes.title: Vital Signs
episodes.overview: When June's niece suffers renal trauma, Neal stumbles upon a cruel scheme to harvest human organs and brings the case to Peter.

episodes.title: Home Invasion
episodes.overview: With Fowler off his back for the time being, Neal turns his focus to the music box. His first step is to contact Alex Hunter, a beautiful high-end fence who may know the whereabouts of the coveted antique.

episodes.title: Bottlenecked
episodes.overview: Neal thinks an old adversary is using materials from a museum heist to counterfeit a bottle of wine owned by Benjamin Franklin. A supposedly impossible feat, and yet an anonymous seller has put a Franklin bottle up for auction at the prestigious auction house Weatherby's. Can it be a coincidence?

episodes.title: Front Man
episodes.overview: Neal helps an old friend whose daughter has been kidnapped, without realizing that it's all a trap from an old enemy. Meanwhile, Neal makes Alex an offer. If she tells him where the music box is, he'll steal it and give it to her.

episodes.title: Out of the Box
episodes.overview: After months of searching, Neal has finally found the object of everyone's desire - the music box. But in order to get it, Neal is going to have to first get his tracking anklet turned off. Meanwhile, Peter and Diana try to take down Fowler.
